events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and I would like to request a refund. The product shipped was not what I paid for.
The system has categorised the customer issue as a Refund request based on the keywords in their message.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the customer's refund case for further assistance.
Hello! I'm Sarah from customer support. I'm sorry to hear about the wrong item you received. I am here to help you with your refund.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the item you received so I can verify the issue quickly?
Thank you for your reply. My order number is 123456789 and I have attached the photo showing the incorrect item received.
We have confirmed the issue and I am processing your refund now. You will receive a full refund within 5 business days. We apologize for the inconvenience.
Thank you for the quick response. I appreciate your help and look forward to receiving the refund soon.
The refund has been successfully processed and your case has been resolved. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the refund and everything is satisfactory. Please reach out if you have more questions.
Since the refund was successfully received and no further issues were reported, we are now closing your support case. Thank you for your patience.
